items.title: Refactoring Footer & Navigation
items.description: Improving the site structure and adding dedicated pages for legal and company info.

items.title: Performance Optimization
items.description: Reducing bundle size and improving initial load times.

items.title: Mobile Responsiveness Polish
items.description: Fine-tuning the UI for smaller screens to ensure a perfect experience on all devices.

items.description: Expanding the library of pre-built learning paths for popular topics.

items.description: Allowing users to update their avatars and personal preferences.

items.title: Social Login
items.description: Login with Google, GitHub, and other providers.

items.title: Export to PDF
items.description: Download learning paths and summaries as PDF documents.

items.description: Seamless switching between light and dark themes.

items.title: Landing Page Redesign
items.description: New modern look for the home page.
